meanings.definition: A person or thing that folds inward.
meanings.sent1: The infolder neatly tucked the paper inside the envelope.
meanings.sent2: The infolder of the map made it easy to carry around.
meanings.sent3: The infolder of the umbrella decided to surprise everyone by folding in half!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like an infolder, closing in on itself to protect from harm.
meanings.sent5: The infolder of the bookshelf kept the books safe and organized.

meanings.sent1: She carefully infoldered the letter before sealing the envelope.
meanings.sent2: The flower petals infoldered as the bud bloomed into a beautiful rose.
meanings.sent3: He infoldered the pizza slice to fit it all in his mouth at once!
meanings.sent4: The mountain infoldered into itself as the earthquake shook the land.
meanings.sent5: The origami artist skillfully infoldered the paper to create a delicate swan.
